review: lovely
fantastic game honestly could go on for hours for hours about all the outstanding details and creative story line but all it comes down to is a solid 1010 game for an amazing price
yes its good

played the demo a while back saw it on sale in my wishlist and wish i bought it full priced  great fun good banter between characters no story beats that i didnt like and the map layout honestly helped keep the story clear in my head   ive still got the dream sequences to do just taking a small break but genuinely fun game 100 recommend it if you like this kinda game glad i went into this semi blind was fun finding new characters

into the breach but with an interesting story and fun characters really love that each levels main missions were not too hard but the bonus optional objectives were tricky and turned the levels into fun puzzles
if i ever meet someone named steve clark nothing will stop me from defenestrating him through an eldritch portal  absolutely incredible game a practically flawless experience
wizards are cooooool

if you loved the recent xcom games youll be all over this one imo short sweet full of character and mechanically sound at first i wasnt sure the art style is very different of course from xcom but the characters won me over and it plays very well and felt right at home
im usually not much of a tactics person but i loved this game so much
good writing good gameplay likeable characters except steve clark
good strategy game that makes you think about placement the jokes and interactions between characters in the game is gold

clever funny well written whats not to like i love the characters story line and game play it plays somewhere between xcom and a puzzle game an absolutely solid game with great diverse character abilities and strengths great fun to play
brainbending puzzles adorable and hilarious story  characters

plays like into the breach crossed with xcom  the story is a lot of fun and makes you care about the characters and the style and graphics are lovely  i really enjoyed the 20 hours i spent with this games and would like to spend a little more

i watched this games development with great interest as a fan of toms previous two games and also because its premiseart looked really cool i can say that im not disappointed in the least with the game that came out of it
what a delight the tight tactics game that doesnt overstay its welcome would be a classic on its own but the story and writing elevate it to an alltime great
one of the best tactical turn based games ive played closer to into the breach rather than xcom insanely well written story world  characters

this game is amazing its funny has a great story and is just fun to play in general the tactical gameplay is super fun but can get a little repetitive at times but the story and humor more than make up for it i can say i enjoyed every second of this game and if you like throwing people out of windows stopping a world super power from starting a war and just fun in general i think you will too

this is a wonderful game that oozes effort personality and charm from every pore with a lovely gameplay loop and surprisingly gripping story that rides the line with real stakes while not taking itself too seriously   really looking forward to seeing what the devs get up to next

i couldnt help but see the similarities between this and xcom chimera squad but fortunately this differs quite a bit from it doesnt feel xcommy at all which is refressing after all the pulled hair under random dice rolls this is more tightly knit puzzle game but youve still got options on how to proceed well im only two missions in but i like the mechanics already and the humorous writing works too
very good game i love the story and the worldbuilding though id prefer that the missions have b more b viable solutions i hate being reminded that im stupid
interesting and original setting perfect logicaltactical gameplay kinda funny dialogues
absolutely worth it
the gameplay is fun the writing is fun what more could i want

brilliant very fun and innovative game play that mixes in puzzle elements with tactical strategy the story was well done too everything balanced well and kept me hooked until the end loved the way the story was told with the caseclue board too

ton of fun experimenting as mechanics perks and enemy types build up over the run a lot of challenge in the additional objectives even if they only unlock cosmetics characters are all fun and likable with enjoyable dialog and banter   top pick for defenestration fun

this game was so fun with just the correct amount of challenge for me with the extra confidence goals to make me want to continue while not being too hard to make me feel disinterested when i failed the story was fun and worked but is nothing to write home about this game makes me want to play all the tactics games i own

clever funny surprisingly moving in emotional ways  this game is easily one of the best games ive played in years  the writing was wildly good the artstyle was unique and fun and the gameplay was a blast  well worth the money

this game is absoluty hilarious banks is my absolute favorite and the conversaton with dall about chorism is suprisingly deep and thoughtfull in the interpritation of lost loved ones 1010 would tell the hippocrates on my level again
necromancer medic that shoots their patients in the head throws drugs at people and can teleport themselves and others no more need be said on why this review is positive
fun tactical combat with even better writing

great little game i cant recommend it enough its a fun little puzzler where the gimmick is you can keep replaying your turn until you get it right you get a squad wizards with very different abilities to play with and it never gets dull  but the actual best thing about the game is the writing its constantly funny but also manages to touch on serious mental health issues like grief ptsd and low selfesteem in a respectful and genuinely touching way

hands down one of the best written games ive played in a while clever and funny dialog tactics to get into and a story that did make me emotional at the end loved every second of it and will for sure come back thanks for making this all the time it took was time well spent
great game 5 stars
pretty interesting but in the beginning pretty boring

a short but beautifully crafted experience that is well worth the buy the strategy is complex enough but unpunishing and finding new ways to throw enemy militia out of windows does not cease to amuse for at least 20 hours
came for the taktics stayed for the story great writing and a good game

this is the perfect blend between humour and tactical decisions very well designed characters and abilities well written dialogues and just enough challenge without getting frustrating highly recommend this to anyone
six hours in and i understand all the great reviews fun game play good retry mechanism reduces frustration funny banter of all the characters intriguing mystery give it all to me

really excellent game not too long and i had fun even 100ing it fun writing likeable cast addictive gameplay strongly recommend

surprisingly great game all around the story is very interesting with the writing including depth and humour the gameplay is very interesting if you enjoy puzzles while being sufficiently forgiving to allow creativity the level design enemy design and character design gives you a lot of variety so that it never gets repetitive  if you are even debating getting this game then get it i will be keeping an eye on more games from the same developer

a fun little game crafted on a budget with love and passion and with high attention to every detail the writing feels dorky and awkward at the start but then you get used to it the story is difficult to follow especially with all the madeup city names and personas the art design is simplistic yet beautiful the gameplay is very good and smooth the last mission feels rushed and underdeveloped

never been a huge fan of turnbased games but this one just clicked for me the bonus challenges almost make it feel like a puzzle game at times which i personally enjoy the worldbuilding and setting are great you can tell a lot of passion went into making this game an easy 910 from me
